704: This position is responsible for supervising the daily Annuity activity of Baird’s Financial Advisors and other PWM branch associates in accordance with the firm’s written supervisory procedures, and in partnership with PWM and CRG leadership. Using expertise in discovering, escalating, resolving and following-up on issues and frequently identified patterns of behavior, the Sr. Annuity Supervision Officer will provide additional research and surveillance. As a Senior Annuity Supervision Officer, you will: Supervise the daily Annuity offerings utilizing various tools and expertise to discover, escalate, resolve and follow-up on issues directly with Financial Advisors. In partnership with regional Senior Supervisory Officers (SSO), enforce the firms written supervisory policies and procedures, continually assess to identify improvement opportunities and work with the Compliance and other CRG departments to enhance. Be the primary point of contact for all Annuity issues and escalations from Branch Manager(s) and Client Resource Team. Respond to telephone calls, emails and requests from PWM branch associates on supervisory questions.
